text: Donald J. Williamson (February 2, 1934 â€“ April 2, 2019) was an American businessman and politician. He served as mayor of Flint, Michigan from 2003 to 2009. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born and grew up in Flint. Williamson was married to Patsy Lou and had four children. Williamson died of problems from a respiratory illness on April 2, 2019. He was 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Businesspeople from Michigan Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Politicians from Flint, Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Don Williamson
